modName: Aria Frostwhisper 2.0 - Based on Aria Giovanni (Requiem compatible)
summary: HD head mesh follower based on Aria Giovanni. Aria has a full package set so even if you don't use her as a follower she will still become a roaming NPC in your game. Requiem compatible.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=6]WARNING! THIS FILE CONTAINS NUDITY!
[/size][/color]
 Aria Frostwhisper comes from a proud Nord family in the snowy regions of Skyrim. Her father taught her to use swords at a young age and she eventually ventured out to see the world. Aria was raised to worship Talos and found her way to Ivarstead where she learned of the Greybeards. After many months of visiting them up on High Hrothgar and bringing them supplies they allowed her to study the way of the voice. Two years later she had been able to master the Frost shout with their help, but the call of adventure could pull her away from further studies.

 Aria loves to feel the fresh air on her skin and has a habit of being naked as much as she can. Her swords, Winter's Bite and Kneebender are always close by though.

[u][color=#ff0000][size=4]Aria will not be available until you enter High Hrothgar and activate her. You will receive a message once she is in the game.[/size][/color][/u]

Aria will be naked by the river in Ivarstead near the bridge leading to Riften, inside the Vilamyr Inn, inside High Hrothgar, by the fire or up in the tower in the High Hrothgar courtyard or wandering somewhere in between. If it is raining during the day Aria will go inside the Vilamyr Inn.

[b][color=#9900ff]I did her lip color to match her name and the shout.[/color][/b]

[url=https://flic.kr/p/NwmQ6E][img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1898/30535970248_4049e69e32_c.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=https://flic.kr/p/zQpMfX][img]https://farm1.staticflickr.com/628/22207604975_68a030a917_z.jpg[/img][/url]


[size=5][u]
[color=#ff0000][b]This file requires a skeleton like [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url] and the Dragonborn DLC or you will CTD![/b][/color][/u][/size]

Standalone follower. Aria is marriageable.
Simple NMM installation.
Cleaned with TES5Edit.

[color=#9900ff][size=4][b]There is an alternate file to add wet skin![/b][/size][/color]

Aria will level with the player up to 150.
CBBE body. HDT ready.

[b][color=#00ffff][size=4]Aria will "blink" for a moment when she passes over the Ivarstead bridge. This is the only way I could get her to equip her armor after swimming naked.[/size][/color][/b]

If she does not equip her gear, simply take an armor piece from her and give it back to her.

She has the lightfoot perk so she wont trigger pressure plates.
She has many one handed perks and a several heavy armor perks. She will work fine with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url]

Her combat style is dual wielding and shouting. She has a Nordic bow for ranged attacks.
Winter's Bite has the Chillrend enchantment and Kneebender has a stagger enchantment. I changed it to 30% chance to stagger to keep her from stagger locking enemies and I added a shock effect so you know when it works. Aria's swords are not usable by the player and cannot be disenchanted.

The three scripts are on trigger boxes and only effect Aria.

Most screenshots were taken with [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83091]Antique Dragon ENB[/url]
[b][size=4]
This video shows her in action.[/size][/b] (I did remove the helmet you see in the video from her outfit in this version.)

[youtube]FhW8dtt7aEw[/youtube]

[size=4][b]A closer look at her new face.[/b][/size]

[youtube]eiioPHtusrs[/youtube]


The armor she is wearing is Vanilla Carved Nordic, but I use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/?]Remodeled Armor for CBBE[/url] by ChronoTrigger77

[b]This is a Nexus exclusive and not to be uploaded to any other site.
[/b]
